name: Frustration
description: You lash out at a creature, venting your frustration at your trainer. Make a melee attack roll against a creature, doing 1d6 + MOVE normal damage on a hit. When you make this attack, add an additional bonus to hit and damage equal to the number of levels you are below zero on the Loyalty Chart. This move bypasses the Loyalty penalty roll, except for uncontrollable creatures based on SR limitations.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 1d10 at level 5, 2d8 at level 10, and 5d4 at level 17.

contest.effect: Startles the last Pokemon to act before the user.
